1.title: Mia und Charly auf dem Bauernhof

episode of.title: HipHorses - Du und dein Pferd (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

1.plot: The pony comes as a wild horse to the horse farm. Together with her mother Mia wants to tame the pony to ride it.

2.title: Larissa und Dressur-Pony Checker Jack

episode of.title: HipHorses - Du und dein Pferd (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

2.plot: When the Pony Checker Jack was born Larissa was only seven years old. But she knew immediately: "If he's big, I'll ride him!" Now Larissa is twelve years old, and when she goes to the dressing tournament, then with Checker Jack.

3.title: Jonas und Westernpferd Wantani

episode of.title: HipHorses - Du und dein Pferd (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

3.plot: In Saxony-Anhalt lives a real cowboy. He is called Jonas, ten years old, and often sits in a Western saddle. This saddle is on Wantani, his best friend.

4.title: Zoe und ihr Voltigierpferd

episode of.title: HipHorses - Du und dein Pferd (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

4.plot: Handstand and balancing act on the back of a horse: No problem for Zoe from Delitzsch in Saxony. She has been vaulting for six years and does not trust anybody more than her horse Rubin Fiorello.

5.title: Aileen und die Minipferde Nellie, Donna und Co.

episode of.title: HipHorses - Du und dein Pferd (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

5.plot: Aileen from Leipzig in Saxony loves her miniature horses. After her school she cares lovingly around her. Now there are two foal births in their barn. Aileen is very excited.

6.title: Annika und Spring-Pony Oh-Fiona

episode of.title: HipHorses - Du und dein Pferd (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

6.plot: Annika prepares for the big jumping tournament. In this competition, she wants to show what she can do and, of course, perform well. For this she trains every day with her four sports ponies on her own riding field at home and at the club.

7.title: Finnja und Showpferd Missy

episode of.title: HipHorses - Du und dein Pferd (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

7.plot: Finnja, from Bremen, is 13 years old and loves to show. Finnja prepares a new riding show, where she wants to participate with her pony Missy.

8.title: Ronja und Paula auf der Heupenmühle

episode of.title: HipHorses - Du und dein Pferd (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

8.plot: Ronja and Paula are two horse-crazy sisters who would like to spend the whole day in the horse farm. But the most beautiful are the horse riding holidays, which the girls prefer to spend in the Eifel.
